description:
The Outdoor Activities Club prepares for their first camping trip. They may have to improvise a little. Meanwhile, Rin sets out to camp in Nagano.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le cercle de plein air et la solitaire
The Outdoor Activities Club and the Solo Camping Girl
نادي النشاطات في الهواء الطلق وفتاة التّخييم الانفرادي
野クルとソロキャンガール
야외 활동 서클과 솔로 캠핑 걸
